holidays.title: National K9 Veterans Day
holidays.description: Dogs trained to serve our country are heroic and look so cute in their little uniforms.

holidays.title: National Napping Day
holidays.description: It falls one day after Daylight Savings time because that’s where people are most sleep-deprived.

holidays.title: Adelaide Cup
holidays.description: Get ready for the fastest horses and jockeys this March Public Holiday!

holidays.title: Canberra Day
holidays.description: On Canberra Day, let’s celebrate its rich history and its numerous contributions to Australia.

holidays.title: Commonwealth Day
holidays.description: The historic event is a public holiday in some of its states and honors history.

holidays.title: Commonwealth Day in Canada
holidays.description: God Save the Queen and her Commonwealth! Celebrate the glorious history of the British Empire.

holidays.title: Eight Hours Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the victory of the workers of Australia and an eight-hour workday with us.

holidays.title: International Every Girls Wins Day
holidays.description: Stand with women around the world for equity, better healthcare, education, and economic literacy.

holidays.title: K-9 Veterans Day
holidays.description: Learn all about the long history of dogs in the military, police, and rescue services.

holidays.title: Ken Day
holidays.description: Ken Day celebrates the life of Ken, Barbie’s sweet, supportive, loyal boyfriend.

holidays.title: L. Ron Hubbard Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the birth and achievements of L. Ron Hubbard — a famous writer.

holidays.title: National Coconut Torte Day
holidays.description: Put on your apron as we whip up some sweet, coconutty goodness today!

holidays.title: National Earmuff Day
holidays.description: Time to get warmed up as we celebrate yet another special National Earmuff Day!

holidays.title: National Good Samaritan Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National Good Samaritan Day by performing a special act of kindness today.

holidays.title: National Jewel Day
holidays.description: What are you waiting for? Wear, gift, or buy something sparkly today.

holidays.title: National Open An Umbrella Indoors Day
holidays.description: Let’s see how our day ‘unfolds’ as we open up our umbrellas!

holidays.title: Smart and Sexy Day
holidays.description: Get set to discover why Smart and Sexy Day is so important!

holidays.title: Taranaki Anniversary Day
holidays.description: Prepare for some history, today we are going to learn about Taranaki and its conflicts.

holidays.title: Common’s Birthday
holidays.description: This award-winning rapper and songwriter has excelled in every endeavor he has undertaken.

holidays.title: Kathy Hilton’s Birthday
holidays.description: This powerhouse of a businesswoman shows no sign of slowing down anytime soon.

holidays.title: Kevin Samuels’s Birthday
holidays.description: Curious about how YouTuber Kevin Samuels got started? We've got the details.

holidays.title: Ozuna’s Birthday
holidays.description: We delve into this talented artist's career accolades, which feature studio albums and notable film roles.
